collection_holder_name: The University of Texas at Austin, Fine Arts Library
pageContext.collection_description: Includes approximately 1,700 tapes of the following radio drama series: The Black Museum, The Detectives, NBC University Theater, Theatre Royal, Suspense, The Queen's Men, The Lives of Harry Lime, Inner Sanctum and The Scarlet Pimpernel. A list of the contents of most of the tapes is available.
